intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to Club House. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you use our service.

account.title: 2.1 Account Information
account.name: Name (if provided)
account.google: Google profile information (if you sign in with Google)

dataUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
dataUse.provide: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
dataUse.process: Process transactions and send related notifications
dataUse.respond: Respond to comments, questions, and support requests
dataUse.send: Send technical information, security updates, and administrative messages
dataUse.protect: Protect against, identify, and prevent fraud and other illegal activities

dataSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:

providers.title: Service providers
providers.content: With providers who help us operate our service (such as Supabase for authentication)

legal.title: Legal requirements
legal.content: When necessary to comply with the law or protect our rights

consent.title: Consent
consent.content: With your explicit consent for other purposes

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.object: Object to processing of your information

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, analyze service usage, and personalize content.

retention.title: 8. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the last updated date.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us at:

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Club House, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with these terms, do not use the Service.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content: Club House is a class management and attendance platform. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the Service at any time without prior notice.

eligibility.title: 3.1 Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 13 years old to use this Service. By creating an account, you represent that:
eligibility.accurate: All registration information you provide is accurate and current
eligibility.maintain: You will maintain the accuracy of such information
eligibility.legal: You are legally capable of entering into binding contracts

security.title: 3.2 Account Security
security.confidential: Maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password
security.responsible: All activities that occur under your account
security.notify: Immediately notifying us of any unauthorized use

acceptable.title: 4. Acceptable Use
acceptable.content: You agree NOT to use the Service to:
acceptable.ip: Infringe on others' intellectual property rights
acceptable.illegal: Transmit illegal, offensive, threatening, or defamatory content
acceptable.virus: Distribute viruses, malware, or malicious code
acceptable.reverse: Perform reverse engineering or attempt to access unauthorized systems
acceptable.spam: Conduct spam or unauthorized commercial activities

important.title: Important
important.content: Violation of these rules may result in immediate suspension or termination of your account.

ip.title: 5. Intellectual Property
ip.content: All content, features, and functionality of the Service are owned by Club House and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

responsibility.title: 6.1 Responsibility
responsibility.content: You are solely responsible for content you post or transmit through the Service.

license.title: 6.2 License
license.content: By posting content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, and display such content in connection with the Service.

privacy.title: 7. Privacy
privacy.content: Your use of the Service is also subject to our

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your access to the Service:
termination.notice: Without prior notice in cases of serious violations

disclaimer.title: 9. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The Service is provided 'AS IS' and 'AS AVAILABLE'. We do not warrant that:
disclaimer.uninterrupted: The Service will be uninterrupted or error-free
disclaimer.virus: The Service is free of viruses or other harmful components

limitation.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Club House shall not be liable for indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.

indemnification.title: 11. Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold Club House harmless from any claims arising from:

modifications.title: 12. Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will take effect immediately upon posting.

governing.title: 13. Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with applicable laws.

contact.title: 14. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, contact us at:

errors.invalidQrCode: Invalid QR code or check-in failed
errors.notEnrolled: User is not enrolled in this class
errors.cameraPermission: Failed to start camera. Please check permissions.
errors.sessionCreationFailed: Failed to create or load class session
